verse: त्वत्पादपद्मपाथोधौ विचरंतो महामुद: कुर्वन्ति कृतिनः केचिच्चतुर्वर्गं तृणोपमम्

terms.त्वत्पादपद्मपाथोधौ: at the path of Your lotus feet
terms.तृणोपमम्: as insignificant as a piece of straw

meaning: Wandering at the path of Your lotus feet, great souls (devotees) perform some (spiritual) activities considering the four goals of life as insignificant as a piece of straw.
